heading: Challenge The Mission To Earn DB Tokens Worth $19,730
title: Challenge Mission Get DB Token
subTitle: Eligibility & Rules

data.text: Users must donate 1000DB to participate in this event.
Users only need to invite 6 friends to participate in the event to receive dividend rewards.

subitem.text: - The first 6 referral bonuses are 550 DB Token each
- The referral bonuses after 6 are 950 DB Token each

data.text: Users can enjoy 3 dividend pools get DB Token:

subitem.text: (a) Phase 1 pool-Users can get up to 7560 DB Token
(b) Phase 2 pool-Users can get up to 30240 DB Token
(c) Phase 3 pool-Users can get up to 159500 DB Token
